description.brazilian: Completar uma missão.
description.english: Win a mission.
description.french: Remporter une mission.
description.german: Gewinne eine Mission.
description.schinese: 获得一次任务胜利。
description.spanish: Ganar una misión.

description.brazilian: Conversar com um campeão no acampamento.
description.english: Talk with a Champion in the camp.
description.french: Dialoguer avec un Champion dans le camp.
description.german: Sprich mit einem Champion im Lager.
description.schinese: 在营地中与一名英雄对话。
description.spanish: Hablar con un Campeón en el campamento.

description.brazilian: Completar um desafio secundário.
description.english: Complete a secondary quest.
description.french: Réussir une quête secondaire.
description.german: Schließe eine Nebenquest ab.
description.schinese: 完成一次次要征途。
description.spanish: Conseguir un desafío secundario

description.brazilian: Encontrar Aerica durante a campanha.
description.english: Meet Aerica during the campaign.
description.french: Rencontrer Aerica au cours de la campagne.
description.german: Triff Aerica in der Kampagne.
description.schinese: 在征途模式中与埃丽卡见面。
description.spanish: Encontrar a Aerica durante la campaña.

description.brazilian: Desbloquear 25 Relíquias diferentes no modo campanha.
description.english: Unlock 25 different Relics in campaign mode.
description.french: Débloquer 25 Reliques différentes en mode campagne.
description.german: Schalte im Kampagnenmodus 25 verschiedene Relikte frei.
description.schinese: 在征途模式中解锁25件圣物。
description.spanish: Desbloquea 25 reliquias diferentes en el modo campaña.

description.brazilian: Encerrar a invasão do Império Rubro.
description.english: Put an end to the invasion of the Scarlet Empire.
description.french: Mettre fin à l'invasion de l'Empire Écarlate.
description.german: Beende die Eroberung durch das Scharlachrote Reich.
description.schinese: 终结赤红帝国的入侵。
description.spanish: Poner fin a la invasión del Imperio Escarlata.

description.brazilian: Concluir a campanha.
description.english: Complete the campaign.
description.french: Terminer la campagne.
description.german: Schließe die Kampagne ab.
description.schinese: 完成征途模式。
description.spanish: Terminar la campaña.

displayName.brazilian: Os primeiros passos de uma líder
displayName.english: The First Steps of a Leader
displayName.spanish: Los Primeros Pasos de una Jefa

description.brazilian: Obter todas as estrelas do Ato 1 da campanha.
description.english: Obtain all stars in Act 1.
description.french: Obtenir toutes les étoiles de l'acte 1 de la campagne.
description.german: Erhalte alle Sterne in Akt 1.
description.schinese: 在第一幕中获得满星。
description.spanish: Obtener todas las estrellas del acto 1 de la campaña.

description.brazilian: Obter todas as estrelas do Ato 2 da campanha.
description.english: Obtain all stars in Act 2.
description.french: Obtenir toutes les étoiles de l'acte 2 de la campagne.
description.german: Erhalte alle Sterne in Akt 2.
description.schinese: 在第二幕中获得满星。
description.spanish: Obtener todas las estrellas del acto 2 de la campaña.

description.brazilian: Obter todas as estrelas do Ato 3 da campanha.
description.english: Obtain all stars in Act 3.
description.french: Obtenir toutes les étoiles de l'acte 3 de la campagne.
description.german: Erhalte alle Sterne in Akt 3.
description.schinese: 在第三幕中获得满星。
description.spanish: Obtener todas las estrellas del acto 3 de la campaña.

description.brazilian: Obter todas as estrelas da campanha.
description.english: Obtain all stars in the campaign.
description.french: Obtenir toutes les étoiles de la campagne.
description.german: Erhalte alle Sterne in der Kampagne.
description.schinese: 在征途模式中获得全部评星。
description.spanish: Obtener todas las estrellas de la campaña.

description.brazilian: Ganhar uma partida no modo Arena contra a IA clássica.
description.english: Win an Arena game against classic AI.
description.french: Gagner une partie en mode Arène contre l'IA classique.
description.german: Gewinne ein Arena-Spiel gegen die klassische KI.
description.schinese: 在赛场模式战胜经典模式AI。
description.spanish: Ganar una partida en el modo Arena contra la IA clásica.

description.brazilian: Ganhar uma partida no modo Arena contra a IA experimental 1.
description.english: Win an Arena game against experimental AI level 1.
description.french: Gagner une partie en mode Arène contre l'IA Expérimentale niveau 1.
description.german: Gewinne ein Arena-Spiel gegen die experimentelle KI der Stufe 1.
description.schinese: 在赛场模式战胜试炼一AI。
description.spanish: Ganar una partida en el modo Arena contra la IA experimental 1.

description.brazilian: Ganhar uma partida no modo Arena contra a IA experimental 2.
description.english: Win an Arena game against experimental AI level 2.
description.french: Gagner une partie en mode Arène contre l'IA Expérimentale niveau 2.
description.german: Gewinne ein Arena-Spiel gegen die experimentelle KI der Stufe 2.
description.schinese: 在赛场模式战胜试炼二AI。
description.spanish: Ganar una partida en el modo Arena contra la IA experimental 2.

description.brazilian: Ganhar uma partida no modo Arena contra a IA experimental 3.
description.english: Win an Arena game against experimental AI level 3.
description.french: Gagner une partie en mode Arène contre l'IA Expérimentale niveau 3.
description.german: Gewinne ein Arena-Spiel gegen die experimentelle KI der Stufe 3.
description.schinese: 在赛场模式战胜试炼三AI。
description.spanish: Ganar una partida en el modo Arena contra la IA experimental 3.

description.brazilian: Jogar uma partida amistosa no modo Arena.
description.english: Play a friendly match in Arena mode.
description.french: Jouer une partie amicale en mode Arène.
description.german: Spiele ein Freundschaftsspiel im Arena-Modus.
description.schinese: 在赛场模式进行一场私人房间匹配游戏。
description.spanish: Jugar una partida amistosa en el modo Arena.

description.brazilian: Ganhar uma partida ranqueada no modo Arena acumulando 25 pontos.
description.english: Win a ranked Arena game through points scoring.
description.french: Remporter aux points une partie classée en mode Arène.
description.german: Gewinne ein Ranglisten-Arena-Spiel durch Punktesammeln.
description.schinese: 通过天境积分获得一场排位赛胜利。
description.spanish: Ganar une partida ranked en el modo Arena con puntos.

description.brazilian: Ganhar uma partida ranqueada no modo Arena ao capturar o Pilar Principal do oponente.
description.english: Win a ranked Arena game by capturing your opponent's Main Pillar.
description.french: Remporter une partie classée en mode Arène en capturant le Pilier Majeur adverse.
description.german: Gewinne ein Ranglisten-Arena-Spiel, indem du die Hauptsäule deines Gegners eroberst.
description.schinese: 通过夺取对方主宰晶柱获得一场排位赛胜利。
description.spanish: Ganar une partida ranked en el modo Arena capturando el Pilar Principal del adversario.

description.brazilian: Alcançar o nível Ouro (1400 pontos) no modo Arena.
description.english: Reach Gold rank (1,400 points) in Arena mode.
description.french: Atteindre le rang Or (1 400 points) en mode Arène.
description.german: Erreiche den Gold-Rang (1.400 Punkte) im Arena-Modus.
description.schinese: 在赛场模式中获得1400分，达到黄金段位。
description.spanish: Alcanzar el rango Oro (1400 puntos) en el modo Arena.

description.brazilian: Alcançar o nível Platina (1600 pontos) no modo Arena.
description.english: Reach Platinum rank (1,600 points) in Arena mode.
description.french: Atteindre le rang Platine (1 600 points) en mode Arène.
description.german: Erreiche den Platin-Rang (1.600 Punkte) im Arena-Modus.
description.schinese: 在赛场模式中获得1600分，达到白金段位。
description.spanish: Alcanzar el rango Platino (1600 puntos) en el modo Arena.

description.brazilian: Alcançar o nível Diamante (1800 pontos) no modo Arena.
description.english: Reach Diamond rank (1,800 points) in Arena mode.
description.french: Atteindre le rang Diamant (1 800 points) en mode Arène.
description.german: Erreiche den Diamant-Rang (1.800 Punkte) im Arena-Modus.
description.schinese: 在赛场模式中获得1800分，达到宝钻段位。
description.spanish: Alcanzar el rango Diamante (1800 puntos) en el modo Arena.

description.brazilian: Alcançar o nível Mestre (2000 pontos) no modo Arena.
description.english: Reach Master rank (2,000 points) in Arena mode.
description.french: Atteindre le rang Maître (2 000 points) en mode Arène.
description.german: Erreiche den Meister-Rang (2.000 Punkte) im Arena-Modus.
description.schinese: 在赛场模式中获得2000分，达到宗师段位。
description.spanish: Alcanzar el rango Maestro (2000 puntos) en el modo Arena.
